title: Window - means an opening to the outside other than the door which provides all or part of the required natural light, ventilation or both, to the interior space
clause_text: Window - means an opening to the outside other than the door which provides all or part of the required natural light, ventilation or both, to the interior space.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Window - means an opening to the outside other than the door which provides all or part of the required natural light, ventilation or both, to the interior space.
